error_message: RedNote MCP skill failed: Playwright browser dependencies missing. Unable to verify attractions via RedNote user reviews as required. Gaode Maps data collected successfully but RedNote verification is mandatory for Chinese destinations per agent requirements.

attractions.name: Raffles City Chongqing Observation Deck (来福士观景台)
attractions.location: Chongqing Raffles Hotel, Yuzhong District
attractions.notes: Hotel observation deck, visit early morning after arrival, breakfast at Raffles after viewing. Part of hotel complex.

attractions.name: Huguang Guild Hall (湖广会馆)
attractions.location: Changjiang Binjiang Road, Bajiaoyuan No.1, Yuzhong District
attractions.notes: POI ID: B0017822LZ. Traditional architecture and cultural site. NOTE: User specified NO interest in historical buildings with stories - recommend skipping or brief visit only.

attractions.name: Xiayuan Li (下浩里)
attractions.location: Nanbin Road, intersection with Dongshuimen Bridge, South Bank District
attractions.notes: POI ID: B0FFHS7UNC. Trendy old street area with cafes and photo spots. Visit Xiyue Box (熹玥盒子) while here. Has waterfall feature at Luoqiao Square.

attractions.name: Longmenhao Old Street (龙门浩老街)
attractions.location: Nanbin Road No.105, South Bank District
attractions.notes: POI ID: B0FFJ0756U. Near Xiayuan Li, walking distance. Old street with colonial buildings, cafes and restaurants. Evening river views.

attractions.name: Liziba Station Observation Platform (李子坝单轨穿楼观景平台)
attractions.location: Liziba Main Street No.62, Yuzhong District
attractions.notes: POI ID: B0FFLH5QFT. OPTIONAL. Famous for light rail passing through building. Can be crowded. Metro Line 2 Liziba Station.

attractions.name: Hongya Cave Folk Area (洪崖洞民俗风貌区)
attractions.location: Jialing River Binjiang Road No.88, Yuzhong District
attractions.notes: POI ID: B0FFG8V7SH. OPTIONAL. Famous night view spot. Can be extremely crowded. Best viewed from across river.

days.notes: Family time day - no sightseeing attractions planned

attractions.name: Nankang Slope (南龛坡)
attractions.location: Hongbei Road Nankang Section, Bazhong
attractions.notes: POI ID: B0FFIABFF3. Local scenic spot. Choose between this OR Wangwang Mountain based on time/preference.

attractions.name: Wangwang Mountain (望王山)
attractions.location: Jiangbei Second Ring Road, Bazhong
attractions.notes: POI ID: B033B0QG33. Has sports park (B0FFI2XCY9) and observation platform (B0FFIKECGC). Choose between this OR Nankang Slope.

attractions.name: Chengdu Research Base of Giant Panda Breeding (成都大熊猫繁育研究基地)
attractions.location: Panda Avenue No.1375, Chengdu
attractions.notes: POI ID: B001C7WE5S. Visit 9am-10am as scheduled. Book tickets online in advance. Early morning best for active pandas.

attractions.name: Jinli Ancient Street (锦里古街)
attractions.location: Wuhou Temple Street No.231, Chengdu
attractions.notes: POI ID: B0FFFD3P2C. Traditional street with food and shops. Cover 3 restaurants here: Mingting, Niu Chengcheng, Taolin.

attractions.name: People's Square (人民广场)
attractions.location: Renmin Avenue No.185, Huangpu District, Shanghai
attractions.notes: POI ID: B00157917M. Pass by only, no extended visit planned. Central location with metro hub.

attractions.name: The Bund (外滩)
attractions.location: Zhongshan East 1st Road, Huangpu District, Shanghai
attractions.notes: POI ID: B00155FXB3. Iconic Shanghai landmark. Walk along waterfront, view colonial architecture. Best at sunset/evening. Observation deck available (B0FFLBPUT6).

attractions.name: INFJ-Friendly Niche Spots
attractions.location: TBD - Various locations in Shanghai city center
attractions.notes: NOT FULLY RESEARCHED. User requested niche fancy INFJ-friendly spots. Recommend: quiet art galleries, boutique cafes in French Concession, small bookstores. Specific locations need additional research.

attractions.name: Shanghai Disneyland (上海迪士尼乐园)
attractions.location: Shendi West Road No.753, Chuansha Town, Pudong New District, Shanghai
attractions.notes: POI ID: B0KDJ78DYD. Full day visit. Book tickets online in advance (mandatory). Check park hours and show schedule. Peak season pricing ~599 RMB (~82 USD). Metro Line 11 to Disney Resort Station. Arrive at opening for popular rides. Consider FastPass/Premier Access.

attractions.name: Pudong Art Museum (浦东美术馆)
attractions.location: Binjiang Avenue No.2777, Pudong New District, Shanghai
attractions.notes: POI ID: B0FFLCKUTU. POSSIBLY visit. Modern art museum on the Bund. Check current exhibitions online. Closed Mondays typically.

attractions.name: Indie Bookstores with English Books
attractions.location: TBD - Various locations in Shanghai
attractions.notes: NOT FULLY RESEARCHED. User requested indie bookstores with English sections. Recommend researching: Sinan Books, Old China Hand Reading Room, Chaterhouse Books. Specific locations and opening hours need verification.

attractions.name: Cute Toy Shops (Pop Mart Style)
attractions.location: TBD - Various locations in Shanghai
attractions.notes: NOT FULLY RESEARCHED. User interested in Pop Mart style collectibles/toys. Pop Mart has multiple Shanghai locations. Also check Labubu stores, X11 stores. Need specific addresses.

days.notes: Registration event and dance performance day - no sightseeing attractions

attractions.name: Tsinghua University (清华大学)
attractions.location: Shuangqing Road No.30, Haidian District, Beijing
attractions.notes: POI ID: B000A7BD6C. Campus tour to establish girlfriend's comfort zone. May require ID for entry. Check visitor policies. Famous for engineering and sciences.

attractions.name: Peking University (北京大学)
attractions.location: Yiheyuan Road No.5, Haidian District, Beijing
attractions.notes: POI ID: B000A816R6. Adjacent to Tsinghua. Beautiful campus with Weiming Lake. May require ID/advance booking for entry.

days.notes: No far trips - local area exploration and couple photography session
No far trips (Tuesday) - evening activities OK, establishing living routine
No far trips (Wednesday) - small cafes and cute shops exploration locally
No far trips (Thursday) - evening activities OK

attractions.name: Forbidden City (故宫博物院)
attractions.location: Jingshan Front Street No.4, Dongcheng District, Beijing
attractions.notes: POI ID: B000A8UIN8. MUST BOOK ONLINE IN ADVANCE - tickets sell out days ahead. Closed Mondays. Enter via Meridian Gate (午门). Recommended route: Central axis → East palaces → West palaces. Allow 3-4 hours minimum. Entry via Tian'anmen security check.

attractions.name: Nanluoguxiang (南锣鼓巷)
attractions.location: Jiaodaokou Street, Dongcheng District, Beijing
attractions.notes: POI ID: B0FFFAH7I9. POSSIBLY visit. Traditional hutong alley with cafes and shops. Metro Line 6/8 Nanluoguxiang Station. Can be very crowded on weekends.

attractions.name: 798 Art District (798艺术区)
attractions.location: Jiuxianqiao Road No.4, Chaoyang District, Beijing
attractions.notes: POI ID: B000A81FY5. POSSIBLY visit. Contemporary art galleries in former factory complex. Free entry to district, individual galleries may charge. Best for art/photography enthusiasts.

days.notes: Flexible day trip or city exploration - shopping for fashion items
Flexible exploration - indie bookstores, cafes, cute shops (specific locations need research)
No far trips (Tuesday) - evening activities OK
No far trips (Wednesday) - evening activities OK
No far trips (Thursday) - evening activities OK

attractions.name: Tianjin Day Trip (天津一日游)
attractions.location: Tianjin City
attractions.notes: POSSIBLE day trip. High-speed train from Beijing ~30-35 minutes. Major attractions: Tianjin Eye (天津之眼 - POI ID: B00160F6Y9), Italian Style Street, Ancient Culture Street, Wudadao (Five Great Avenues). Research specific attractions and train times if confirmed.

days.notes: Final day - flexible, wrap up any remaining activities

notes:
CRITICAL ISSUES:

1. RedNote MCP Verification FAILED: Playwright browser dependencies missing in environment. Unable to verify attractions via RedNote user reviews as required by agent instructions. This is a BLOCKING requirement for Chinese destinations.

2. Data Quality: All attraction data sourced from Gaode Maps POI search only. Without RedNote verification:
   - Cannot confirm current user sentiment/reviews
   - Cannot verify actual visitor experiences
   - Missing authentic local recommendations
   - Cannot validate if attractions are currently popular/relevant

3. Incomplete Research:
   - Shanghai niche INFJ-friendly spots: NOT fully researched (Day 5)
   - Shanghai indie bookstores: Need specific locations with English sections (Day 7)
   - Shanghai cute toy shops: Need specific Pop Mart and similar store locations (Day 7)
   - Beijing indie bookstores/cafes: Need research for Days 12, 16
   - Tianjin specific attractions: Need detailed research if trip confirmed (Day 20)

4. Booking Requirements:
   - Forbidden City: MUST book online 7-10 days in advance
   - Shanghai Disneyland: Book tickets online in advance
   - Chengdu Panda Base: Recommend advance booking

5. User Preference Note:
   - User specified NO interest in historical buildings with stories
   - Huguang Guild Hall (Day 1) may not align with preferences
   - Recommend focusing on niche, fancy, cute places over traditional tourist spots

6. Cost Estimates:
   - All costs in RMB converted to approximate USD
   - Disneyland ticket price is peak season estimate
   - Actual prices may vary by season and booking method

7. Seasonal Considerations:
   - Late February weather: Cold in Beijing (0-5°C), mild in Shanghai/Chengdu
   - Panda Base: Best visited early morning when pandas are active
   - Outdoor attractions may be affected by weather

RECOMMENDATION: Re-run this agent after fixing RedNote MCP Playwright dependencies to complete verification requirements.
